dcterms:creator: O. Maler
D. Nickovic
dcterms:description: A formal specification language used to describe high-level temporal behaviors of continuous signals, extending metric temporal logic for real-time systems.
dcterms:title: Signal Temporal Logic (STL)

dcterms:creator: A. Donzé
T. Ferrere
O. Maler
dcterms:description: A dataset focused on efficient robust monitoring for STL, providing methods to evaluate the robustness of STL specifications.
dcterms:title: STL Robust Monitoring

dcterms:creator: A. Donzé
O. Maler
dcterms:description: This dataset investigates the robust satisfaction of temporal logic over real-valued signals, focusing on temporal robustness metrics.
dcterms:title: Temporal Robustness of STL

dcterms:creator: A. Rodionova
L. Lindemann
M. Morari
G. J. Pappas
dcterms:description: This dataset addresses combined left and right temporal robustness for control under STL specifications, focusing on control synthesis.
dcterms:title: Combined Temporal Robustness

dcterms:creator: A. Rodionova
L. Lindemann
M. Morari
G. J. Pappas
dcterms:description: This dataset explores the time-robust control for STL specifications, focusing on control synthesis under time uncertainty.
dcterms:title: Time Robustness in STL

dcterms:creator: D. Aksaray
A. Jones
Z. Kong
M. Schwager
C. Belta
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on Q-learning for robust satisfaction of STL specifications, providing methods for reinforcement learning in control synthesis.
dcterms:title: Q-learning for STL Specifications

dcterms:creator: A. T. Buyukkocak
D. Aksaray
dcterms:description: This dataset investigates the temporal relaxation of STL specifications for resilient control synthesis, focusing on control under uncertainty.
dcterms:title: Temporal Relaxation of STL Specifications
